name: Enforces a particular annotation style of complex types
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/array-style-complex-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces a particular array type annotation style of simple types
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/array-style-simple-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces a particular style for boolean typeannotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/boolean-style at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Marks Flow type identifiers as defined
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/define-flow-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent use oftrailing commas in Object and Tuple annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/delimiter-dangle at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent spacing within generic type annotation parameters
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/generic-spacing at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires an empty line after the Flow annotation
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/newline-after-flow-annotation at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Checks for duplicate properties in Object annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-dupe-keys at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Disallows use of the existential type (*)
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-existential-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Disallows $FlowFixMe comment suppressions
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-flow-fix-me-comments at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires use of $ReadOnlyArray instead of just Array or array shorthand notation
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-mutable-array at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Disallows use of primitive constructors as types, such as Boolean, Number and String
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-primitive-constructor-types at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Disallows Flow type imports, aliases, and annotations in files missing a valid Flow file declaration (or a @noflow annotation)
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-types-missing-file-annotation at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: An extension of ESLint's no-unused-expressions
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-unused-expressions at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Warns against weak type annotations any, Object and Function
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/no-weak-types at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent separators between properties in Flow object types
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/object-type-delimiter at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: This rule enforces exact object types
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-exact-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires that all function parameters have type annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-parameter-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires that functions have return type annotation
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-return-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires all type declarations to be at the top of the file, after any import declarations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-types-at-top at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Validates Flow file annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-valid-file-annotation at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Requires that all variable declarators have type annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/require-variable-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent use of semicolons after type aliases
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/semi at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces sorting of Object annotations
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/sort-keys at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent spacing after the type annotation colon
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/space-after-type-colon at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent spacing before the opening < of generic type annotation parameters
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/space-before-generic-bracket at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent spacing before the type annotation colon
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/space-before-type-colon at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces a consistent naming pattern for type aliases
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/type-id-match at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces a particular style for type imports
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/type-import-style at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Enforces consistent spacing around union and intersection type separators (| and &)
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/union-intersection-spacing at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.

name: Marks Flow type alias declarations as used
description: See description of ESLint rule flowtype/use-flow-type at the eslint-plugin-flowtype website.
